attributes.action: Reduce plastic bottle use in cafes and restaurants
attributes.background: How often have I brought a bottle of water or soft drink from a cafe, shop or tourist attraction how many thousands of bottles am I responsible for? Let’s stop cafes and restaurants selling needless plastic bottles for onsite consumption when there are alternatives.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on cafes and restaurants, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
